room_title: Escape room "The Experiment" by Codescape in Charlotte
review: I have now done two of their rooms, Experiment and Shipwreck. Both times had a great experience, they have the best escape room set ups I have seen in Charlotte. Highly recommend it to anyone and definitely will be going back to do the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Experiment" by Codescape in Charlotte
review: This is the 2nd time we've been to CodeScape. The rooms were completely different but challenging. "The Experiment" was as creepy as it was fun. Thanks for the fun CodeScape!

room_title: Escape room "The Experiment" by Codescape in Charlotte
review: Codescape is amazing! I did the experiment with 3 friends. The room has a very authentic feel to it (we did The Experiment), the puzzles are fun and the experience is very immersive. Highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "The Experiment" by Codescape in Charlotte
review: We did The Experiment. None of us had ever done an escape room before and, of course, we chose the highest difficulty first! We got close but not close enough! Thank you to Tony & all the lovely people who made it such a great time! Highly recommend!
